_header: Of the blessed martyr Saint Sebastian
Subjects: Sebastian, saint; introductions, to prose texts; prayers, to saints
_description: Introductory couplet to a ME prose praye

BodDou1.Transcription:
Of the blessyd martir saynt Sebastyane whos greuous paynes none tell
                    can

Thompson.Note:
Hamer (1995)
XHamer,  Richard. 
             A Manuscript Index to the Index of Middle English Verse.
         London: British Library, 1995 lists as Unidentified, Missing or
                    Destroyed.
